Title: Looking Out for Stateville
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Craig Gore, Tim Walsh, Cole Maliska (executive story editor), Mo Masi (story editor), Ryan Maldonado (story editor), Eduardo Javier Canto (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: Voight enlists his former cell mate to help take down a major cocaine supplier, while Burgess makes a move regarding her relationship with Ruzek and Roman comes up with a plan to fund Platt and Mouch's wedding.
